description.name: SysML v2 Pilot Implementation Update Site

site.description: This site contains feature and plugin versions for the Eclipse-based pilot implementation of SysML v2, as developed by the SysML v2 Submission Team.

category-def.name: KerML and SysML Editors
category-def.label: KerML and SysML Editors
category-def.description: Xtext editors for the KerML and SysML textual notations.
